data.message: Hey you so called ex Eminem fans.  You should know he doesn't get on the internet so whatever your saying doesn't make one damn  bit of difference 😂 💯

replies.message:
Edit; lololol I didn’t read ex fans.

There is always the hope he could take a peek out of curiosity 🤷‍♀️💁🏻❤️
Some of us have bigger issues,I only boiled the kettle five minutes ago but my tea's gone cold and i'm wondering why?
He might start when he sees his album sell less copies then ever. Hahaha. Mighta been a big hit at BET. How many black people you know slump Eminem in their car 😂
Ya I don't really think he cares about that lol

"Less copies " hahahahaha alright Lucas Aspenleiter sure he will if anything he'll sell more just because everyone knows trump is a thick cunt that cares more about his shitter account than running the country.
I bet he buys his pet food online.

Ex fans where not truly his fans. I dispise Trump with a passion but I still like kid Rock when Kid Rock came out in support of trump I didn't just say I'm no longer a fan. I may not understand or agree with this politics but that doesn't mean he makes crappy music.

Jake McCorry Very true! I like Kid Rock also. He likes Trump I don't judge him for it and I still listen to his music. I don't follow or agree with Trump haven't since day 1 or even before he thought about being in office.
I just don't get why is that when Em attacked Trump they all get BUTTHURT but didn't when he did the same to Bush  or Clinton but OMG do it to TRUMP and everyone loses their mind! 😂

Feminem is an SJW beta male pussy and he admitted to being DeAngelo's bitch in the highschool bathroom in his early raps. He never was tough and he never will be but weak minded fools buy into his extremely phony persona. Having trained in Muay Thai and some MMA I'd kick Feminem's ass on my worst day!
